header.subtext: Informed decisions, reduced lead times and faster deliveries to support brands, retailers and designers buy sustainably and transparently.

elements.title: Speed Up the Supply Chain
elements.content:
Order Ready-To-Ship styles in low MOQs & receive delivery within a week.

Reduce Inventory & Markdown Risk

 Replenish Best-Sellers

elements.title: Restore Value
elements.content:
Every year we lose $120 billion worth of economic and environmental capital in the form of surplus stock going to landfill. 

To reduce their environmental footprint, many of our Drops are made with high-end surplus yarns & fabrics.

We partner with factories to restore value & reduce waste

elements.title: Sustainability Commitments
elements.content:
We passionately believe that fashion should not harm the earth or people.
Every detail matters - we commit to be transparent, be accountable and carefully select alternatives to reduce our environmental impact.  

Besides surplus stocks, we use materials with low carbon footprint such as linen, Tencel and certified fibres

Most of our trims & packaging are made from bio-degradable or recycled materials. 

For the balance we aim to source recycled alternatives by 2021

elements.title: Behind the Label
elements.content:
We believe that transparency and accountability are essential to build real partnerships. Our ‘unbranded’ labels and swing tags include the maker’s exact coordinates.

Each garment has an additional swing tag indicating any sustainable quality.

**Partner with us and use this in your brand story!**
